meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #899.

td.p: Randy Waite, a teacher from Salina, Kansas
Rick Cook, a writer from Phoenix, Arizona (whose 1-day cash winnings total $12,300)

tr.td: NORTH DAKOTANS
SPORTS
MAMMALS
PROVERBS
ROCK TRIVIA
HOLIDAYS & OBSERVANCES

body.div: The J! Archive is created by fans, for fans. The Jeopardy! game show and all elements thereof, including but not limited to copyright and trademark thereto, are the property of Jeopardy Productions, Inc. and are protected under law.
